verses.roman:
gupte tā-sabāke āni' ṭhākura nityānanda
śikhāilā sabākāre kariyā prabandha

synonyms: gupte—in confidence; tā-sabāke—unto all the cowherd boys; āni'-taking them; ṭhākura nityānanda—Nityānanda Ṭhākura; śikhāilā—instructed; sabākāre—all of them; kariyā prabandha—by making a reasonable story.
translation: Calling all the boys in confidence and telling a reasonable story, Nityānanda Prabhu instructed them as follows.
